trans-unit.source: Specifies when and how a part will be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: Especifica cuándo y cómo se va a inicializar un elemento.

trans-unit.source: In the course of composition, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> needs instances of the objects described by exports in order to fill imports.
trans-unit.target: En el curso de composición, el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer> necesita las instancias de los objetos descritos por exportaciones para rellenar las importaciones.

trans-unit.source: If a one export is used to fill multiple imports, there are two possible behaviors.
trans-unit.target: Si una exportación se usa para rellenar varias importaciones, hay dos posibles comportamientos.

trans-unit.source: Either a single instance of the exported object is created, and a reference to the same object is given to every importer, or a separate instance of the exported object is created for each importer.
trans-unit.target: Se crea una única instancia del objeto exportado y una referencia al mismo objeto se da a cada importador, o se crea una instancia independiente del objeto exportado para cada importador.

trans-unit.source: Which behavior occurs depends on the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute> attached to the export and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.RequiredCreationPolicy%2A> of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: Comportamiento que se produce depende de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute> adjunta a la exportación y el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute.RequiredCreationPolicy%2A> de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.ImportAttribute>.

trans-unit.source: Both of which will contain a value from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Dos de las cuales contendrá un valor comprendido entre el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy> enumeración.

trans-unit.source: If the policies are incompatible, that export will not be considered a match for the given import.
trans-unit.target: Si las directivas son incompatibles, esa exportación no se considerarán a una coincidencia para la importación determinada.

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes the interaction of these two properties.
trans-unit.target: En la tabla siguiente se resume la interacción de estas dos propiedades.

trans-unit.source: Export's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> specifies Any or none specified.
trans-unit.target: La exportación <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> especifica alguna o no se especifica ninguno.

trans-unit.source: Export's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> specifies Shared
trans-unit.target: La exportación <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> especifica Shared

trans-unit.source: Export's <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> specifies NonShared
trans-unit.target: La exportación <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.PartCreationPolicyAttribute.CreationPolicy%2A> especifica NonShared

trans-unit.source: Any
trans-unit.target: Cualquiera

trans-unit.source: A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.
trans-unit.target: Se creará una instancia compartida única del objeto exportado.

trans-unit.source: A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.
trans-unit.target: Se creará una instancia compartida única del objeto exportado.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.
trans-unit.target: Se creará una nueva instancia del objeto exportado para cada importador.

trans-unit.source: Shared
trans-unit.target: Shared

trans-unit.source: A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.
trans-unit.target: Se creará una instancia compartida única del objeto exportado.

trans-unit.source: A single, shared instance of the exported object will be created.
trans-unit.target: Se creará una instancia compartida única del objeto exportado.

trans-unit.source: The export will not be considered a match for the import.
trans-unit.target: No se considerarán a una coincidencia para la importación de la exportación.

trans-unit.source: NonShared
trans-unit.target: No compartidos

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.
trans-unit.target: Se creará una nueva instancia del objeto exportado para cada importador.

trans-unit.source: The export will not be considered a match for the import.
trans-unit.target: No se considerarán a una coincidencia para la importación de la exportación.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the exported object will be created for each importer.
trans-unit.target: Se creará una nueva instancia del objeto exportado para cada importador.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> will use the most appropriate <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" /> for the part given the current context.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> usará la <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" /> más adecuada para el elemento según el contexto actual.

trans-unit.source: This is the default <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" />.
trans-unit.target: Es la <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy" /> predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: By default, <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> will use <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared" />, unless the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> or importer requests <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared" />.
trans-unit.target: De forma predeterminada, <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> usará <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.Shared" />, a menos que <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> o el importador solicite <see cref="F:System.ComponentModel.Composition.CreationPolicy.NonShared" />.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a new non-shared instance of the associated <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> will be created by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> for every requestor.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> creará una nueva instancia no compartida del <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> asociado para cada solicitante.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that a single shared instance of the associated <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> will be created by the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> and shared by all requestors.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que una única instancia compartida del <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart" /> asociado será creada por <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Hosting.CompositionContainer" /> y compartida por todos los solicitantes.
